actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to allow Frank T. Carr retired pay and veterans' benefits as if he had retired from the United States Army.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to pay to a named individual the amount of retired pay such individual would have received had he retired from the U.S. Army on a certain date. Treats such individual as a veteran for purposes of determining eligibility for veterans' benefits.

titles.title: A bill to allow Frank T. Carr retired pay and veterans' benefits as if he had retired from the United States Army.
